#rule_type: Check for consistent date data type
#rule_type_description: Check each cell has the same date data type as the majority of others a column.

#rule_type: Check for consistent number data type
#rule_type_description: Check each cell has the same date data type as the majority of others a column.

#description: Rare value: check that it is correct

#meta+comment: Placenames may benefit from spell checking
#description: Rare value: check that it is correct

#meta+comment: Look for consistent datatypes with indicators
#description: Possibly inconsistent datatype for this indicator
Extra whitespace can affect reporting and visualisation
#rule_type_description: Check each cell for leading and trailing white spaces and for more than one white space between words.

#description: Invalid p-code found
#rule_type_description: For a column with HXL tag indicating it contains p-codes, check the value in each cell is a p-code that can be found in the ITOS service.

#description: Invalid admin unit name found
#rule_type: Check for valid admin unit names
#rule_type_description: For a column with HXL tag indicating it contains admin unit names, check the value in each cell is an admin unit name that can be found in the ITOS service.

#description: Invalid combination of p-code and administrative unit name found
#rule_type: Check for consistent and valid p-code and name combinations
#rule_type_description: For a column with HXL tag indicating it contains admin unit names and another with HXL tag indicating it contains p-codes, check the values in corresponding cells are consistent by comparing with the ITOS service.

#description: P-code and admin unit name combinations not consistent
#rule_type: Check for consistent p-code and name combinations
#rule_type_description: For a column with HXL tag indicating it contains admin unit names and another with HXL tag indicating it contains p-codes, check the values in corresponding cells are consistent.
